pageContext.description: 3 of them flattened on the faces, one circular section. uneven.
pageContext.surface: smooth in the 3 flattened ones. corroded in the round one.
pageContext.associations: One of a hoard of 15 objects & a piece of sandstone, possibly belonging to a mould. 2 spearheads, 1 socketed Celt, 6 rings, 2 Pins with Rings & 4 Beads (1 large of clay, 1 of glass, yellow & purple twist, 2 of amber, a larger & a smaller, irregularly shaped).
pageContext.collection: Museum of Archaeology & Ethnology, Cambridge, No. 245 Murray Collection
pageContext.site: Ireland, King's Co. (Offaly), near Edenderry, Drumcooley Hill, 1854
pageContext.remarks: Two pins with Ring & beads at least are Early Christian (see pin card at [...]) with Trillick ring.
